description.ko: 첨단 기술과 도시의 쇠락이 네온사인과 디지털 광고의 끊임없는 불빛 아래 공존하는 미래 대도시의 숨막히는 전경입니다.
description.en: A breathtaking look into a futuristic metropolis where advanced technology and urban decay coexist under the constant glow of neon lights and digital advertisements.

prompt: A hyper-detailed cyberpunk cityscape at night, towering skyscrapers with massive holographic advertisements, rain-slicked streets reflecting neon signs in electric blue and magenta, flying vehicles weaving through dense urban canyons, cinematic lighting, synthwave aesthetic, 8k resolution, volumetric fog, futuristic architecture.
